com.customlbs.library.model

Class Map

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.customlbs.library.model.Map
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.os.Parcelable

    public class Map
extends java.lang.Object
implements android.os.Parcelable
    Model representing a map.

    A map is the visual representation of a floor as tiles in different tile sizes (resolution as mm per pixel). Each tile size (zoom level) is backed by the corresponding bitmaps.

    A map always has a base resolution retrieved by getMmPerPixelBase() for tile size 1. This is the most detailed representation.

    The mm per pixel is calculated as getMmPerPixelBase() * tile size. Tile sizes are always a power of 2 (1 - 2 - 4 - 8 ...).

      • getFittingResolution

        public Tiles getFittingResolution(double resolution)
        Get the tiles with the most fitting resolution i.e. with [100, 200, 400] available, a given resolution of 150 will return the background with 100, a 151 will return 200.
